cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)

SET(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeModules)

set(RAPIDJSON_MAJOR_VERSION "1")
set(RAPIDJSON_MINOR_VERSION "1")
set(RAPIDJSON_PATCH_VERSION "0")
set(RAPIDJSON_VERSION_STRING "${RAPIDJSON_MAJOR_VERSION}.${RAPIDJSON_MINOR_VERSION}.${RAPIDJSON_PATCH_VERSION}")

add_library(RapidJSON INTERFACE)

target_include_directories(RapidJSON 
    INTERFACE 
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
)
